TopicTitle: Community TeamSpeak3 Server - In space, WE can hear you scream!

Articles.Content: It's quiet. Too quiet.
hmm sounds interesting...let's see what happens...
Hmm...I'll stop by. Sounds interesting!
Very few new people ever on...
Hm. The only people on at this time are playing DayZ in the VAB. Is that okay?
anyone still alive on the server?
When I get on this tomorrow, oh man are we gonna crack out the explosives!
I may set one of these up for myself, IRC is nice, but it's just not fast enough and I can't express emotion as well as over mic.
I Joining The Team Speak Now :3
Dl and signing up. It'll be nice to talk shop with people who know what KSP is.
I'll try this out tomorrow. See you people there (hopefully!).
Wish there was a ventrillo server.

Wish there was a ventrillo server.

No, use ts!
booo... everyone on is asleep, was looking forward to some ksp chatter
I was wondering all this time if KSP had a TeamSpeak channel. Looks like this is it! I'll jump on in as soon as I can.
(necro but still relevant) I cant believe this ts is still active. Three cheers for Majiir!
of course it is still active we use for larking about all the time.
Last few times I logged on there everything is in some asian language and everyone there is talking about New Vegas or something else.

Last few times I logged on there everything is in some asian language and everyone there is talking about New Vegas or something else.

Yep, that's the place. It's pretty laid-back.

The server's undergone some upgrades and database purges in the past few days, so the above is no longer the case! It's also now published on the server list, so we may see increased activity. There's still a regular crowdÃ¢â‚¬â€and we don't always play KSP, so feel free to come on any time.

If you have an old bookmark that isn't working, make sure your bookmark points to ksp.nabaal.net and does not include a port number.

Hi,

Would love to come and chat. Does anyone still use the server?

and 2nd. Do you guys use the KMP? I know its soon to be added to the full game alot people waiting on that but.. untill then. anyone wanna try ..

durp your install first- and remember to backup your saves and crafts.

Thanks-

Dennis -
Hello, would love to see this going on again Yup, it would be really fun if we would play it on kmp!
Yes there is a teamspeak! Sweet! I think someone should start a KSP-TV teamspeak specific server.
I think the title needs to be changed to "In space WE can hear you swear".
I just found this recently, how come nobody seems to be on? Also, why are most of the channels locked?
